Name: Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)
Data notes: Imaging (MRI & PET data) & clinical meta-data

Name: Structured Analysis of the Retina Project (STARE)
Data notes: Retinal imaging and clinical meta-data

Name: Japanese Society of Radiological Technology (JSRT)
Data notes: CXR dataset with pulmonary nodules and normal controls

Name: COVID-19 CT Segmentation Dataset
Data notes: CT dataset of patients with COVID-19 infection

Name: Open Source COVID 19 Collection
Data notes: Collated list of COVID-19 resources including CT data repository links, analytic source code and links to applications

Name: Mini-MIAS Mammography Database
Data notes: Mammographic imaging repository

Name: Annotated Optical Coherence Tomography Retinal Dataset
Data notes: Retinal imaging dataset

Name: SpineWeb - Collaborative Platform for Research on Spine Imaging and Image Analysis
Data notes: Online collaborative platform with datasets and links to spinal imaging related resources

Name: University of South Florida Screening Mammography Database
Data notes: Large database of screening mammograms (approx 2500 studies)

Name: Segmentation in Chest Radiographs Database
Data notes: Public repository of segmented chest radiographs

Name: ELCAP Public Lung Image Database
Data notes: Dataset of low-dose thoracic CT scans including annotations

Name: Diabetic Retinopathy Database (DIARETDB1)
Data notes: Public database for benchmarking diabetic retinopathy detection from digital images

Name: AccuRetina Dataset - Inoveon Corporation
Data notes: Large database of retinal imaging in diabetic patients

Name: Stanford University Center for AI in Medicine & Imaging (AIMI) Shared Datasets
Data notes: Multiple curated imaging datasets covering neuro CT & MRI, knee MRI, cardiothoracic CT, cardiac ultrasound and plain films
Area of focus: Musculoskeletal Pathology, Chest Pathology, Cardiac Pathology, Brain Pathology

Name: University of Alicante CXR Imaging Dataset - PadChest
Data notes: Large dataset of CXR imaging and reports covering a wide variety of pathologies

Name: BrainWeb - Simulated Brain MRI Dataset
Data notes: Database of simulated brain MRI data (normal controls and multiple sclerosis )

Name: Collaborative Informatics and Neuroimaging Suite (COINS)
Data notes: Web based data management system for collating and sharing neuroimaging and clinical meta-data with anonymised MRI datasets also available

Name: Mendeley Data Repository & Search Engine
Data notes: Secure cloud-based repository for data storage and associated search engine

Name: Google Dataset Search Engine
Data notes: Customised Search Engine for discovery of datasets

Name: Optical Coherence Tomography Retinal Imaging Datasets
Data notes: Collated list of Optical Coherence Tomography Retinal Imaging datasets

Name: Digital Retinal Images for Vessel Extraction (DRIVE) Grand Challenge Dataset
Data notes: Retinal imaging dataset from a diabetic retinopathy screening program in the Netherlands

Name: Figshare Data Repository
Data notes: Cloud based repository for open scientific data

Name: Federal Interagency Traumatic Brain Injury Research Informatics System (FITBIR)
Data notes: Data repository for traumatic brain injury research studies

Name: COVID Thoracic Imaging Dataset
Data notes: Github repository of COVID-19 cases with CXR or CT imaging data

Name: DeepCovid Dataset
Data notes: Github repository of COVID-19 CXR imaging data and DeepCovid algorithm

Name: COVID-CT Dataset
Data notes: Github repository of COVID-19 CT imaging dataset

Name: Computer Vision Online - Image Database Library
Data notes: Collated list of image and video databases that may be of use in computer vision research and algorithm development

Name: Emphysema CT Database
Data notes: Data repository of thoracic high resolution CT (HRCT) imaging in patients with emphysema

Name: MedPix Imaging Database
Data notes: Open-access online database of medical images, teaching cases and clinical metadata

Name: Center of Diagnostics and Telemedicine Moscow
Data notes: Mixed imaging datasets including plain films, cardiac, neuro and thoracic CT, brain and lumbar spine MRI and mammography

Name: The Osteoarthritis Initiative - National Institutes of Health
Data notes: 10-year observational study in osteoarthritis with clinical, patient-reported outcome, biological, plain film and MRI imaging date on nearly 5000 pts

Name: Open Neuro Repository
Data notes: Open access platform for validating and sharing MRI, PET, MEG and EEG datasets

Name: Open I - Open Access Biomedical Image Search Engine
Data notes: Search engine for biomedical imaging datasets from the National Institutes of Health

Name: Data Cite Search Engine
Data notes: Search engine for meta-data (not specific to imaging)

Name: Image Datasets List from Angel Cruz-Roa
Data notes: Selected hyperlinks to imaging data repositories

Name: Cornell University Public Lung Database
Data notes: Dataset of annotated thoracic CTs with lung nodules from Cornell University

Name: The Cancer Imaging Archive - National Institutes of Health
Data notes: Varied datasets of imaging and meta-data in multiple tumour types

Name: GrepMed Searchable Medical Image Library
Data notes: Open access medical image library - not specifically imaging datasets

Name: National Academic Research and Collaborations Information System (NARCIS) - Netherlands
Data notes: Search engine for open access publications and datasets from Dutch Universities

Name: NeuroImaging Tools & Resources Collaboratory (NITRC)
Data notes: Neuroinformatics software and data repository including MR, PET, SPECT, CT and EEG/MEG datasets

Name: Open Access Series of Imaging Studies (OASIS) - Neuroimaging datasets
Data notes: Longitudinal neuroimaging, clinical, cognitive and biomarker dataset for normal aging and Alzheimer's Disease

Name: COVID CXR Imaging Dataset - Pakistan Institute of Engineering and Applied Sciences
Data notes: Dataset of 15k CXR images (normal and COVID positive patients) available on request

Name: Stanford University Echocardiography Dataset
Data notes: Large imaging repository of > 10000 echocardiography videos

Name: Cardiac Atlas Project
Data notes: National Institutes for Health funded cardiac MRI datasets

Name: Initiative for Collaborative Computer Vision Benchmarking (ICCVB) Imaging Datasets
Data notes: Prostate cancer MRI and retinal imaging datasets

Name: Medical Imaging Multimodality Breast Cancer Diagnosis (MIMBCD) User Interface
Data notes: GitHub repository of MRI, ultrasound and mammographic imaging in breast cancer from a research group in Lisbon, Portugal

Name: RSNA International COVID-19 Open Radiology Database (RICORD)
Data notes: CXR and thoracic CT datasets in patients with COVID-19

Name: UK Biobank
Data notes: Biomedical database of longitudinal study following health volunteers in the UK

Name: German National Cohort Study Data Repository
Data notes: German population-based cohort study with biobank data

Name: Dementia Platform UK
Data notes: Big data working and synthetic dataset

Name: NeuroImaging Tools & Resources Collaboratory (NITRC)
Data notes: Multiple neuroimaging datasets (MR/PET/CT)

Name: COPD Machine Learning Datasets
Data notes: HRCT Thorax datasets

Name: Brain Tumor Segmentation Challenge (BraTS) – Center for Biomedical Image Computing & Analytics, University of Pennsylvania
Data notes: Oncological brain MRI datasets

Name: Kaggle Grand Challenge Imaging Datasets
Data notes: Multiple imaging datasets (> 100) used in commercial grand challenges

Name: National Institute of Health Data Archive (NDA)
Data notes: Several data repositories including neuroimaging and musculoskeletal imaging datasets

Name: National Biomedical Imaging Archive (NBIA)
Data notes: Searchable repository of imaging datasets used in development and validation of analytical software tools

Name: Swiss Institute for Computer Assisted Surgery (SICAS) Medical Image Repository
Data notes: Various medical imaging datasets (brain, liver, post-mortem imaging)

Name: American College of Radiology Data Science Institute (ACRDSI) Dataset Directory
Data notes: Collated directory of imaging datasets (cancer; CXR; mammography; MSK)

Name: National COVID-19 Chest Image Database (NCCID)
Data notes: CXR and CT datasets with clinical meta-data

Name: OPTIMAM Mammography Imaging Database (OMI-DB)
Data notes: Mammograms including real and simulated images of cancer

Name: Open Access Medical Imaging Repositories
Data notes: Collated list of a large number of open-access medical image repositories

Name: Health Data Research UK Innovation Gateway
Data notes: >500 datasets but not many include imaging currently

Name: King's College London Heathy Adut Human Brain Imaging Database
Data notes: Healthy adult brain PET, MRI and CT imaging datasets
